title: Fluffy buttermilk pancakes
ingredients: ['275g buttermilk', '4 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '50g caster sugar', '150g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 dash salt', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '15g butter or as needed']
